title: Enhanced removal of As(III) by manganese-doped defective UiO-66 coupled peroxymonosulfate: multiple reactive oxygen species and system stability
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00194J, Paper
Zihao Xie, Qingyun He, Shaobo Liu, Xinyi Huang, Mingyang Dai, Qiang Chen, Ang Sun, Jian Ye, Xiaofei Tan, Weihua Xu
In this study, a Mn-doped defective UiO-66 was successfully synthesized. The catalyst/PMS system can efficiently remove As(III) in wide pH and complex water environments.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
